participant_1.background:
I'm not too concerned with my appearance.
I have a busy life, but I manage to keep my priorities straight.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
i like to think about what it would be like to be an artist.
I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.

participant_2.background:
I am relocating my troops to a new location.
my children are a disappointment.
I love listening to alternative rock music while I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill.
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.
I'm feeling a little stressed out and need to take some time for myself.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day been?
Good! I'm going to watch some YouTube videos and study for my upcoming exams.
Sounds like a productive day! I'm getting ready to go for a walk in the woods.
That's sounds nice! I love being outside.
Me too! I like to hike, camp, and fish.
I'm not much of an outdoorsman, but I do like to go for walks.
What kind of music do you like?
I like alternative rock. What about you?
I like a variety of music, but I'm really into country music right now.
That's cool! I used to like country music when I was younger.
What kind of music do you like to listen to while you cook?
I like to listen to rock music when I cook. It gets me pumped up!
I like to listen to music that's upbeat and makes me feel good.
I know what you mean! Music can really change your mood.
